---
title: "A HealthyR bitesize workshop"
---

This is a Quarto-Netlify-GitHub workshop. The resulting website can be viewed here: [quarto-demo.netlify.app](https://quarto-demo.netlify.app/)

Installation:

-   Install the latest version of R on your computer

    -   <https://cloud.r-project.org/>

-   Install the latest version of RStudio Desktop on your computer

    -   <https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download>

Optional (advanced):

-   Install git

    -   <https://git-scm.com/downloads>

-   Make sure you know your GitHub login/create a GitHub account if you don\'t have one already

    -   <https://github.com/>
